languages.text: "Низложение маршала станет испытанием для духа Арбитес, но я верю, они справятся. Нас учили исполнять долг несмотря ни на что, и даже пока не избран новый глава, нас будет вести Лекс Империалис".

"The Marshal's removal is sure to become a test of the Arbites spirit, but I believe in the Arbitrators' perseverance. We were taught to do our duty no matter the circumstances, and even while we are leaderless, the Lex Imperialis will guide us through."
languages.original_text: "Низложение маршала станет испытанием для духа Арбитес, но я верю, они справятся. Нас учили исполнять долг несмотря ни на что, и даже пока не избран новый глава, нас будет вести Лекс Империалис".

languages.text: 「将帥の解任は、高等裁定局の精神が試される出来事となるでしょう。ですが私は、アービトレイターの不屈の精神を信じています。私たちは、どのような状況においても職務を全うするよう教え込まれてきました。たとえ指導者を失おうとも、レックス・インペリアが私たちを導いてくれます」
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's removal is sure to become a test of the Arbites spirit, but I believe in the Arbitrators' perseverance. We were taught to do our duty no matter the circumstances, and even while we are leaderless, the Lex Imperialis will guide us through."

traits.locale_text: 「将帥の解任は、高等裁定局の精神が試される出来事となるでしょう。ですが私は、アービトレイターの不屈の精神を信じています。私たちは、どのような状況においても職務を全うするよう教え込まれてきました。たとえ指導者を失おうとも、レックス・インペリアが私たちを導いてくれます」

languages.text: "Die Entfernung des Marschalls wird mit Sicherheit eine Prüfung für den Geist des Arbites, aber ich glaube an die Hartnäckigkeit der Arbitratoren. Uns wurde gelehrt, unsere Pflicht unter allen Umständen zu erfüllen, und selbst ohne Anführer wird das Lex Imperia uns durch diese Zeit leiten."
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's removal is sure to become a test of the Arbites spirit, but I believe in the Arbitrators' perseverance. We were taught to do our duty no matter the circumstances, and even while we are leaderless, the Lex Imperialis will guide us through."

traits.locale_text: "Die Entfernung des Marschalls wird mit Sicherheit eine Prüfung für den Geist des Arbites, aber ich glaube an die Hartnäckigkeit der Arbitratoren. Uns wurde gelehrt, unsere Pflicht unter allen Umständen zu erfüllen, und selbst ohne Anführer wird das Lex Imperia uns durch diese Zeit leiten."

languages.text: « La disparition du maréchal ne manquera pas de mettre à l'épreuve la résolution de l'Arbites, mais je fais confiance à la foi des arbitrators. On nous a enseigné à accomplir notre devoir, qu'importe les circonstances. En l'absence de dirigeants, la Lex Imperialis nous guidera. »
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's removal is sure to become a test of the Arbites spirit, but I believe in the Arbitrators' perseverance. We were taught to do our duty no matter the circumstances, and even while we are leaderless, the Lex Imperialis will guide us through."

traits.locale_text: « La disparition du maréchal ne manquera pas de mettre à l'épreuve la résolution de l'Arbites, mais je fais confiance à la foi des arbitrators. On nous a enseigné à accomplir notre devoir, qu'importe les circonstances. En l'absence de dirigeants, la Lex Imperialis nous guidera. »

languages.text: «La destitución del mariscal pondrá a prueba la entereza del Arbites, pero creo en la constancia de los Arbitrator. Nos han enseñado a cumplir con nuestro deber sin importar las consecuencias, y aunque nadie nos lidere, la Lex Imperialis nos servirá de guía».
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's removal is sure to become a test of the Arbites spirit, but I believe in the Arbitrators' perseverance. We were taught to do our duty no matter the circumstances, and even while we are leaderless, the Lex Imperialis will guide us through."

traits.locale_text: «La destitución del mariscal pondrá a prueba la entereza del Arbites, pero creo en la constancia de los Arbitrator. Nos han enseñado a cumplir con nuestro deber sin importar las consecuencias, y aunque nadie nos lidere, la Lex Imperialis nos servirá de guía».

languages.text: “元帅被免职的事情，对法务官全体成员的信仰都是个严峻的考验，但我相信全体法务官的决心。我们接受过教导，无论什么情况都会坚持履行职责。即便我们目前处于群龙无首的状态，帝国法典也会指引我们度过难关。”
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's removal is sure to become a test of the Arbites spirit, but I believe in the Arbitrators' perseverance. We were taught to do our duty no matter the circumstances, and even while we are leaderless, the Lex Imperialis will guide us through."

traits.locale_text: “元帅被免职的事情，对法务官全体成员的信仰都是个严峻的考验，但我相信全体法务官的决心。我们接受过教导，无论什么情况都会坚持履行职责。即便我们目前处于群龙无首的状态，帝国法典也会指引我们度过难关。”

languages.text: "Miralay'ın görevden alınması, kesinlikle Arbites ruhunun imtihanına dönüşecektir ancak Yargıcıların azminden kuşkum yok. Bize koşullar ne olursa olsun görevimizi yerine getirmemiz öğretildi ve lidersiz de olsak Lex İmperialis kılavuzumuz olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "The Marshal's removal is sure to become a test of the Arbites spirit, but I believe in the Arbitrators' perseverance. We were taught to do our duty no matter the circumstances, and even while we are leaderless, the Lex Imperialis will guide us through."

traits.locale_text: "Miralay'ın görevden alınması kesinlikle Arbites ruhunun bir imtihanına dönüşecektir ancak Yargıcıların azminden kuşkum yok. Bize koşullar ne olursa olsun görevimizi yerine getirmemiz öğretildi ve lidersiz de olsak Lex Imperialis kılavuzumuz olacaktır."

languages.original_text: "The Marshal's removal is sure to become a test of the Arbites spirit, but I believe in the Arbitrators' perseverance. We were taught to do our duty no matter the circumstances, and even while we are leaderless, the Lex Imperialis will guide us through."
